topics.body:
I'm trying to decide what to watch next after I finish Kamen rider Amazon

I'm thinking either G gundam, Space runaway Ideon, Or Gunbuster
topics.author: 5062d6f17f123b3e16001184

topics.body:
"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53950c1c63687274acf90000#post_53950c1c63687274acf90000

Funny thing I was just watching Ideon right now. And on top of that I was watching Gunbuster last month, but to be honest, I'd say go with Ideon. 

Also I'm currently writing up plans for a story with ponies in space, I still have no idea whether or not that's a particularly sound idea. Seriously would Pinkie Pie even like space? 

Its kind of hard to party in cramped modules with little use for candles since they burn up oxygen and such.
